author: kelvingoodson
msg: TUSCANY-1088 committed Yang's patch -- Default behaviour is now to tolerate bad XML unless disabled by provision of options using the SDOUtil.XML_LOAD_LaxForm (or by the system property XML.load.form.lax -- not tested in this patch)
